title: Gerardo Masini
text:
Gerardo Masini (born December 31, 1982 in <a href="Cipolletti">Cipolletti</a>) is an <a href="Argentina">Argentine</a> professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. Currently, he plays in <a href="Serie%20D">Serie D</a> for <a href="Avezzano%20Calcio">Avezzano Calcio</a>. He also holds <a href="Italy">Italian</a> citizenship.
Career.
Club career.
He played on professional level in <a href="Lega%20Pro%20Prima%20Divisione">Lega Pro Prima Divisione</a> for <a href="Salernitana%20Calcio%201919">Salernitana Calcio 1919</a> and <a href="Potenza%20S.C.">Potenza S.C.</a> and in <a href="Lega%20Pro%20Seconda%20Divisione">Lega Pro Seconda Divisione</a> for <a href="A.S.D.%20Nuova%20Cassino%201924">Cassino</a>, <a href="Ischia%20Isolaverde">Ischia Isolaverde</a> and <a href="A.S.%20Martina%20Franca%201947">Martina</a>.
In September 2010, he was signed by <a href="Serie%20D">Serie D</a> club <a href="A.S.D.%20Luco%20Canistro">Luco Canistro</a>. Subsequently he played with <a href="Teramo%20Calcio">Teramo Calcio</a>, <a href="Ischia%20Isolaverde">Ischia Isolaverde</a>, <a href="A.S.%20Martina%20Franca%201947">Martina</a>, <a href="A.C.%20Rimini%201912">Rimini</a>, <a href="Virtus%20Francavilla%20Calcio">Virtus Francavilla</a>, <a href="U.S.%20Poggibonsi">Poggibonsi</a>, <a href="F.C.%20Francavilla">F.C. Francavilla</a>, <a href="Latina%20Calcio%201932">Latina</a> and <a href="Avezzano%20Calcio">Avezzano</a>.
